channel.description: Recent content in profiling on jdhao's digital space

item.title: How to Profile Your Python Script/Module
item.description: In my previous post, I shared how to profile a single function using line_profiler. In this post, I want to share how to profile Python script/module and visualize the profile stat to pinpoint the slow part of the code.

item.title: Profiling Python Code with line_profiler
item.description: To profile Python code line by line, we can use line_profiler1.
